data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Torres-Gutierrez, Carolina, Sallum, Maria Anice Mureb (2015): Catalog of the subgenus Melanoconion of Culex (Diptera: Culicidae) for South America. Zootaxa 4028 (1): 1-50, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4028.1.1
